get.description: List all libraries the current user is a member of.

schema.title: Response List Libraries Api Libraries Get

post.description: Create a new library. The creator becomes the owner.

get.description: Get a single library by ID.

patch.description: Update a library. Requires owner or admin role.

delete.description: Delete a library. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all members of a library.

schema.title: Response List Library Members Api Libraries  Library Id  Members Get

post.description: Add a new member to a library. Requires admin or owner role.

patch.description: Update a library member's role. Requires owner role.

delete.description: Remove a member from a library. Requires owner or admin role.

BookV2Update.description: Schema for updating book data - all fields optional.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Fields to apply from the candidate data. Empty list applies all.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Physical condition: New, Good, Fair, Poor

physical_location.title: Physical Location
physical_location.description: Shelf, box, or storage location identifier

book_type.title: Book Type
book_type.description: Format type: paperback, hardcover, ebook, pdf, audiobook

series.title: Series
series.description: Series name this physical copy belongs to

acquisition_date.title: Acquisition Date
acquisition_date.description: Date this copy was acquired by the library

checked_out_to.title: Checked Out To
checked_out_to.description: User ID of borrower if checked out

checked_out_at.title: Checked Out At
checked_out_at.description: When the book was checked out

due_date.title: Due Date
due_date.description: Due date for the current loan, if any

cover_image_path.title: Cover Image Path
cover_image_path.description: Local file path for uploaded cover image
